title: Iblard Jikan
synopsis: Much like looking through a window, Iblard Jikan explores the fantastic and beautiful world of Iblard by panning through art created by Naohisa Inoue. Iblard shows itself to be nothing short of amazing and will wash serenity over your mind.
staff: [['Inoue, Naohisa', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Background Art', ' Original Creator']], ['Yonebayashi, Hiromasa', ['Key Animation']], ['Konishi, Kenichi', ['Animation Director']], ['Kasamatsu, Kouji', ['Sound Effects']]]
